prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon with vibrant blue fur and a playful expression.
Imagine a monkey-like Pokemon that loves to splash water everywhere in a tropical forest.
Show me a cute Pokemon with an aquatic theme and a charming personality.
Design a Pokemon that embodies the spirit of water with a unique hairstyle resembling waves.
Generate a small and adorable Pokemon that thrives in wetland environments.
Make a Pokemon that uses water-based attacks and has a joyful demeanor.
Give me a character that resembles a playful primate and has blue accents all over.

distinctive_features: Fluffy blue hair resembling a water wave
Large ears with a round shape
